TEXT.English: A stoneworker engages in stonework, which is the art or process of working in stone, as in masonry or jewelry.
TEXT.French: A stoneworker engages in stonework, which is the art or process of working in stone, as in masonry or jewelry.
TEXT.German: A stoneworker engages in stonework, which is the art or process of working in stone, as in masonry or jewelry.
TEXT.Italian: A stoneworker engages in stonework, which is the art or process of working in stone, as in masonry or jewelry.
TEXT.Spanish: A stoneworker engages in stonework, which is the art or process of working in stone, as in masonry or jewelry.

TEXT.English: A treadwheel crane (magna rola) is a wooden, human powered, hoisting and lowering device. It was primarily used during Roman times and the Middle Ages in the building of castles and cathedrals. The often heavy charge is lifted as the individual inside the treadwheel crane walks. The rope attached to a pulley is turned onto a spindle by the rotation of the wheel thus allowing the device to hoist or lower the affixed pallet.
TEXT.French: A treadwheel crane (magna rola) is a wooden, human powered, hoisting and lowering device. TEXT.French: Augmente la vitesse de Construction des Bâtiments.

TEXT.English: In the fields of architecture and civil engineering, construction is a process that consists of the building or assembling of infrastructure. Far from being a single activity, large scale construction is a feat of multitasking. Normally the job is managed by the project manager and supervised by the construction manager, design engineer, construction engineer or project architect. For the successful execution of a project, effective planning is essential. Those involved with the design and execution of the infrastructure in question must consider the environmental impact of the job, the successful scheduling, budgeting, site safety, availability of materials, logistics, inconvenience to the public caused by construction delays, preparing tender documents, etc.
